q1: ARE YOU KNOW ABOUT BAYERN MUNICH?
a1: I had never heard of them
q2: A german soccer team, I have heard of them. They play in Munich, Germany. They play in the UEFA Champions league. They also play in the DFL-Supercup. These are both great challenging leagues. They have a good squad and a balance offense attack with good forwards. They are my favorite team in Germany and have good team chemistry. q3: What do you know about Bayern Munich?
a3: Default winners of the Bundesliga, not really challenged in Germany, one of the five best teams in the world.
